prompts.prompt: Add a Troubleshooting section with at least 3 common issues to the README.
prompts.expected: README now contains a 'Troubleshooting' section listing >=3 distinct common issues with brief resolutions.

prompts.prompt: Add the standard Apache 2.0 license header to all .cs files in the project.
prompts.expected: Each .cs file begins with the correct Apache 2.0 license header block without altering existing code logic.
